      This is the core class that interacts with the Postmark API. All clients should inherit fromt this class.

      BASE_URL is "https://api.postmarkapp.com"

      $BASE_URL 

      Default

      "https://api.postmarkapp.com"
      Static

      You may modify this value to disable SSL support, but it is not recommended. :var string:
